Outline Width

# Outline Width

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class             | Support     |
| ----------------- | ----------- |
| ```
outline-0
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
outline-1
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
outline-2
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
outline-4
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
outline-8
``` | 🌐 Web only |
